item.title: Computing code coverage for a .NET project
item.description: In an older post, I wrote about how to compute code coverage for a .NET Core project with Coverlet. In this post, I'll show you how to get code coverage without any additional dependency. Indeed, the .NET SDK 8 now includes all you need to compute code coverage. Microsoft also provides a .NET tool to process the coverage files. Let's start by creating a new xUnit project and removing the dependency onâ€¦
